title: Gamification-Based Cognitive Enhancement Process for Novice Programmers

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer literacy and elementary mathematics concepts
context.additional_context: Most learners have no or limited programming experience; the goal is cultivating real-world problem-solving skills through enhanced logical thinking

learning_goals: Learners can perform basic algorithm design and debugging with over 80% accuracy
Learners achieve a 20% or higher score improvement in logical thinking assessments
Learners demonstrate at least three programming problem-solving skills through gamification-based missions
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
